pages.text: $(#630000)With a Lithograph, I can produce Chip Fragments to create defensive items to counter the Enhanced Mobs, among other things. For each Callous Chip, the main crafting ingredient, I'll need several Chip Fragments.

$(#630000)I ought to store the completed Callous Chips in a chest instead of my inventory, as while the machine they came from can no longer reach them, the chips themselves are still somewhat hostile, applying Yielding.
